thread.title: Tech IPOs Need Pure Storage to Succeed
thread.title_full: Tech IPOs Need Pure Storage to Succeed - WSJ

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Tech IPOs Need Pure Storage to Succeed
text:
Pure Storage thinks it is worth about $3 billion. A lot is riding on whether the market agrees.
The company, which makes flash-based storage technology used by businesses, set the terms for its planned initial public offering Thursday. Pure Storage is looking to sell 25 million shares at a range of $16 to $18 a share when it lists on the New York Stock Exchange next month. The midpoint implies a market value of about $3.1...
